summary: This document contains email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey for the week of October 8, 2013. The emails indicate tentative plans for a breakfast meeting and mention that Jeffrey is delaying a decision until the following week.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey and is involved in the scheduling process.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is communicating with Amanda Kirby about the meeting with Jeffrey and providing updates on scheduling.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is the individual with whom the meeting is being scheduled, but his full name is not provided.

Amanda is attempting to schedule a meeting with Jeffrey.

events.title: Tentative Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff discuss scheduling a breakfast meeting with Jeffrey.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff are coordinating a meeting with an individual named Jeffrey.
The meeting is tentatively scheduled for October 8, 2013, at 8 AM.
Jeffrey is delaying a decision on the meeting until the following week.
